general_advisory: According to IMD, Bhubaneswar, thunderstorm with light rainfall is expected in the coming days. Make necessary arrangements for draining out excess water from crop fields in case of rain & give staking in creeping vegetable crop.

advisory: Instead of manual DSR followed by beush ening, farmers are advised to follow mechanized DSR cultivation with appropriate package of practices (Variety selection, Seed treatment, Nutrient management).
Farmers are advised to go for summer ploughing by utilizing the rain received in recent past days.
Arrange good quality seeds of Dhanicha @12kg/acre as green manuring crop.
Mealy bug, Scale insect & other sucking pest can be controlled by spraying of Thiamethoxam @80g/acre.
To control early shot borer in sugarcane, foliar spray of Fipronil 5SC @400 ml/acre is advised.
For timely planting of kharif vegetables like Brinjal & Chilli, prepare the nursery bed & treat the seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed.

To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal, Tomato & Okra, Spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. Later on go for alternate spray of Spinosad 45 SC @70ml/acre or Emamectin benzoate @80-100g/acre & Thiachloprid@250ml/l of water.
To control fruit fly attack in mango, use fruit fly trap.
Papaya - Drain out excess water from the root zone of plant. Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus.
Banana - Provide drainage. Stacking is done with bamboo and other type of sticks during the fruit development stage to protect the plant against wind and rainfall.
To prepare fish pond, apply lime @40-60 kg/acre based on PH & alkalinity value of water. Maintain water level of 5 ft. in the grow out ponds.
Clean the shed & apply disinfectant to protect the animals from any disease outbreak.
